verses.verse: O <WG5599> foolish <WG453> Galatians <WG1052>, who <WG5101> hath bewitched <WG940> <WG5656> you <WG5209>, that ye should <WG3982> not <WG3361> obey <WG3982> <WG5745> the truth <WG225>, before <WG2596> whose <WG3739> eyes <WG3788> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> hath been evidently set forth <WG4270> <WG5648>, crucified <WG4717> <WG5772> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>?

This <WG5124> only <WG3440> would <WG2309> <WG5719> I learn <WG3129> <WG5629> of <WG575> you <WG5216>, Received ye <WG2983> <WG5627> the Spirit <WG4151> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the Torah <WG3551>, or <WG2228> by <WG1537> the hearing <WG189> of faith <WG4102>?
Are ye <WG2075> <WG5748> so <WG3779> foolish <WG453>? having begun <WG1728> <WG5666> in the Spirit <WG4151>, are ye <WG2005> now <WG3568> made perfect <WG2005> <WG5727> by the flesh <WG4561>?
Have ye suffered <WG3958> <WG5627> so many things <WG5118> in vain <WG1500>? if it be yet <WG1489> <WG2532> in vain <WG1500>.

He therefore <WG3767> that ministereth <WG2023> <WG5723> to you <WG5213> the Spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> worketh <WG1754> <WG5723> miracles <WG1411> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, doeth he it by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the Torah <WG3551>, or <WG2228> by <WG1537> the hearing <WG189> of faith <WG4102>?
Havahn as <WG2531> Avraham <WG11> believed <WG4100> <WG5656> 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> it was accounted <WG3049> <WG5681> to him <WG846> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>.
Know ye <WG1097> <WG5719> <WG5720> therefore <WG686> that <WG3754> they which are of <WG1537> faith <WG4102>, the same <WG3778> are <WG1526> <WG5748> the children <WG5207> of Avraham <WG11>.

And <WG1161> the scripture <WG1124>, foreseeing <WG4275> <WG5631> that <WG3754> 'Elohim <WG2316> would justify <WG1344> <WG5719> the heathen <WG1484> through <WG1537> faith <WG4102>, preached before the gospel <WG4283> <WG5662> unto Avraham <WG11>, saying, <WG3754> In <WG1722> thee <WG4671> shall <WG1757> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484> be blessed <WG1757> <WG5701>.
So then <WG5620> they which be of <WG1537> faith <WG4102> are blessed <WG2127> <WG5743> with <WG4862> faithful <WG4103> Avraham <WG11>.

For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> are <WG1526> <WG5748> of <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the Torah <WG3551> are <WG1526> <WG5748> under <WG5259> the curse <WG2671>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, Cursed <WG1944> is every one <WG3956> that <WG3739> continueth <WG1696> <WG5719> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956> which <WG3588> are written <WG1125> <WG5772> in <WG1722> the book <WG975> of the Torah <WG3551> to do <WG4160> <WG5658> them <WG846>.

But <WG1161> that <WG3754> no man <WG3762> is justified <WG1344> <WG5743> by <WG1722> the Torah <WG3551> in the sight <WG3844> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, it is evident <WG1212>: for <WG3754>, The just <WG1342> shall live <WG2198> <WG5695> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>.

And <WG1161> the Torah <WG3551> is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> faith <WG4102>: but <WG235>, The man <WG444> that doeth <WG4160> <WG5660> them <WG846> shall live <WG2198> <WG5695> in <WG1722> them <WG846>.

Moshiach <WG5547> hath redeemed <WG1805> <WG5656> us <WG2248> from <WG1537> the curse <WG2671> of the Torah <WG3551>, being made <WG1096> <WG5637> a curse <WG2671> for <WG5228> us <WG2257>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, Cursed <WG1944> is every one <WG3956> that hangeth <WG2910> <WG5734> on <WG1909> a tree <WG3586>:

That <WG2443> the b'rakhah <WG2129> of Avraham <WG11> might come <WG1096> <WG5638> on <WG1519> the goyim <WG1484> through <WG1722> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>; that <WG2443> we might receive <WG2983> <WG5632> the promise <WG1860> of the Spirit <WG4151> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102>.

Brethren <WG80>, I speak <WG3004> <WG5719> after the manner of <WG2596> men <WG444>; Though it be but <WG3676> a man's <WG444> covenant <WG1242>, yet if it be confirmed <WG2964> <WG5772>, no man <WG3762> disannulleth <WG114> <WG5719>, or <WG2228> addeth thereto <WG1928> <WG5736>.

Now <WG1161> to Avraham <WG11> and <WG2532> his <WG846> seed <WG4690> were <WG4483> the promises <WG1860> made <WG4483> <WG5681>. He saith <WG3004> <WG5719> not <WG3756>, And <WG2532> to seeds <WG4690>, as <WG5613> of <WG1909> many <WG4183>; but <WG235> as <WG5613> of <WG1909> one <WG1520>, And <WG2532> to thy <WG4675> seed <WG4690>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> Moshiach <WG5547>.

And <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG3004> <WG5719>, that the covenant <WG1242>, that was confirmed before <WG4300> <WG5772> of <WG5259> 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1519> Moshiach <WG5547>, the Torah <WG3551>, which was <WG1096> <WG5756> four hundred <WG5071> and <WG2532> thirty <WG5144> years <WG2094> after <WG3326>, cannot <WG3756> disannul <WG208> <WG5719>, that <WG1519> it should make <WG2673> the promise <WG1860> of none effect <WG2673> <WG5658>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the inheritance <WG2817> be of <WG1537> the Torah <WG3551>, it is no more <WG3765> of <WG1537> promise <WG1860>: but <WG1161> 'Elohim <WG2316> gave <WG5483> <WG5766> it to Avraham <WG11> by <WG1223> promise <WG1860>.

Wherefore <WG5101> then <WG3767> serveth the Torah <WG3551>? It was added <WG4369> <WG5681> because of <WG5484> transgressions <WG3847>, till <WG891> <WG3739> the seed <WG4690> should come <WG2064> <WG5632> to whom <WG3739> the promise was made <WG1861> <WG5766>; and it was ordained <WG1299> <WG5651> by <WG1223> angels <WG32> in <WG1722> the hand <WG5495> of a mediator <WG3316>.
Now <WG1161> a mediator <WG3316> is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> a mediator of one <WG1520>, but <WG1161> 'Elohim <WG2316> is <WG2076> <WG5748> one <WG1520>.

Is the Torah <WG3551> then <WG3767> against <WG2596> the promises <WG1860> of 'Elohim <WG2316>? 'Elohim forbid <WG3361> <WG1096> <WG5636>: for <WG1063> if <WG1487> there had been <WG1325> a Torah <WG3551> given <WG1325> <WG5681> which <WG3588> could <WG1410> <WG5740> have given life <WG2227> <WG5658>, verily <WG3689> righteousness <WG1343> should <WG302> have been <WG2258> <WG5713> by <WG1537> the Torah <WG3551>.

But <WG235> the scripture <WG1124> hath concluded <WG4788> <WG5656> all <WG3956> under <WG5259> sin <WG266>, that <WG2443> the promise <WG1860> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> might be given <WG1325> <WG5686> to them that believe <WG4100> <WG5723>.

But <WG1161> before <WG4253> faith <WG4102> came <WG2064> <WG5629>, we were kept <WG5432> <WG5712> under <WG5259> the Torah <WG3551>, shut up <WG4788> <WG5772> unto <WG1519> the faith <WG4102> which should afterwards <WG3195> <WG5723> be revealed <WG601> <WG5683>.

Wherefore <WG5620> the Torah <WG3551> was <WG1096> <WG5754> our <WG2257> schoolmaster <WG3807> to bring us unto <WG1519> Moshiach <WG5547>, that <WG2443> we might be justified <WG1344> <WG5686> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>.
But <WG1161> after that faith <WG4102> is come <WG2064> <WG5631>, we are <WG2070> <WG5748> no longer <WG2089> <WG3765> under <WG5259> a schoolmaster <WG3807>.
For <WG1063> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> all <WG3956> the children <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316> by <WG1223> faith <WG4102> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.
For <WG1063> as many of you as <WG3745> have been immersed <WG907> <WG5681> into <WG1519> Moshiach <WG5547> have put on <WG1746> <WG5668> Moshiach <WG5547>.

There is <WG1762> <WG5748> neither <WG3756> Jew <WG2453> nor <WG3761> Greek <WG1672>, there is <WG1762> <WG5748> neither <WG3756> bond <WG1401> nor <WG3761> free <WG1658>, there is <WG1762> <WG5748> neither <WG3756> male <WG730> nor <WG2532> female <WG2338>: for <WG1063> ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> <WG5748> all <WG3956> one <WG1520> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.

And <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye <WG5210> be Moshiach's <WG5547>, then <WG686> are ye <WG2075> <WG5748> Avraham's <WG11> seed <WG4690>, and <WG2532> heirs <WG2818> according <WG2596> to the promise <WG1860>.
